markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs=""
>
[Bomber's Eye Elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=83)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tincture lets you pinpoint your foes. For the next 5 minutes, your alchemical bomb Strikes reduce the circumstance bonus to AC your targets gain from cover.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 14 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Reduce your targets’ circumstance bonus by 1.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 14"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Reduce your targets’ circumstance bonus by 2.
name: Bomber's Eye Elixir (Greater)
